column4: when i install any package using apt-get, i see the line "ldconfig deferred processing now taking place" .. though there isn't nay problems with the installation, i jus wanna know wat does that line mean?? why does that occur??
no problem there, it started doing that on 7.10, its not an issue
i know that there is no problem there.. but i jus wanted to know why does that line appear??
ans also wat does that line mean?
I dunno, I just accepted it as a new addition to 7.10
